Job Title: Maintenance I

Location: Lebanon, VA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Description

Samuel, Son & Co. is growing! If you're looking for a rewarding career opportunity with a family run, industry leading organization, bring your experience and motivated attitude to Samuel, Son & Co. Due to our continued success, we are seeking a Maintenance Technician to join our team in Lebanon, VA. If you think you have what it takes to become part of our team, contact us today.

Here are some of the great benefits that we offer:

Competitive salaryCompany paid health and dental benefitsPaid vacation and an annual bonusDefined Contribution Pension Plan with company match Opportunity for career stability and growthTuition reimbursement programFlexibility with start and end times (depending on circumstances and position)Protective personal equipment is provided or cost of purchase is reimbursedAffinity group for women (dependent on location)On the job training

Essential Functions

To maintain and perform general repairs on, but not limited to: presses, rolls, welders, and cranes. Inspect and perform preventative maintenance on company equipment & structures. Assist other maintenance personnel as required. 

Education/Certifications/Experience

High School diploma or equivalent. At least 1 year of progressively responsible maintenance experience or its equivalent. Electrical experience in 120V, 240V, 480V, single phase and three phase. Knowledge of hydraulics, machine shop equipment & tools and basic electronics. 

Other Requirements

Reading and writing literacy required. Good manual dexterity, good eye/hand coordination. Close, distant, peripheral & color vision, depth perception, and ability to adjust focus, required. Be thorough and attentive to detail in all job tasks. Communicate with others in a team effort and train other employees. Capable of wearing PPE for an entire shift including; safety glasses, hearing protection and safety shoes. Follow all established safety rules and procedures. Maintain a clean and safe work area. Perform other duties as required. 

Qualifications

Valid Driverâ€™s License. Ability to analyze problems and find safe, workable solutions. Above average mechanical aptitude and math skills, with emphasis on fractions and decimals. Ability to follow instructions and direction. Ability to lift up to 50 lbs. Ability to read & use tape measure & other measurement equipment, & ability to use a calculator. Ability to read and understand maintenance manuals, blueprints and schematics. Ability to meet predefined deadlines while withstanding related pressure and stress. Ability to understand and abide by all safety rules and regulations to perform the job. 

Work experience in related industry is an asset but even if you do not have this or meet all the requirements we still want you to apply. On the job training will be provided.

At Samuel we believe in a culture of equality. Respect and integrity are at our core. We are committed to building and embracing a diverse workforce and creating an environment that is open and inclusive for everyone.

Samuel, Son & Co. U.S. Inc. provides equal opportunities to applicants and employees without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, or disability.

EOE

E-Verify Employer

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
